import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/addflight.css' import axios from "axios" import NavBar from './NavBar' import Footer from './Footer' function AddFight() { const [add, setadd] = useState(0) const handleAddFight=(e)=>{ const data = new FormData(document.getElementById("addFlight")); const value = Object.fromEntries(data.entries()); axios.post('http://localhost:8080/flight/addFlight',value).then((response)=>{ if(response.data=="SUCCESS"){ alert("flight added") setadd(add+1) }else{ alert("Error!!Check the entered fields") } }) } return (

Add Flight

 {add} flights added
Date
Departure
Arrival
) } export default AddFight
